author: Staff Reporter
text:
A rally to create awareness of global warming, conservation of water, cadaver donation, hygiene and blood donation was taken out by the cadets of Bharat Scouts and Guides here on Monday.

The rally was flagged off by Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan from S.L.B. Government Higher Secondary School. It went through Duthie Girls Higher Secondary School, Parthavarthini Street and reached rear side of S.L.B. Girls Higher Secondary School.

In memory

In memory of the Scouting movement founder Lord Baden Powell, the education department conducted quiz and singing competition to the cadets of Bharat Scouts and Guides.

Collector paid a floral tribute to the portrait of Lord Baden Powell and distributed prizes to the winners of the competitions.

Mr. Chavan blessed the 10 Scout guides who had bagged President Award in Nagercoil educational district.

Chief Education Officer V. Jayakumar, President of the Scouts and Guides of Nagercoil Educational District M. Ahmed Khan, District Scout Commissioner P. Ramasamy also participated.
title: Awareness rally taken out in Nagercoil
